Quickstrike:








Quickstrike made an odd growling noise as Striker said he was in charge, and 
saying that Megatron was alive. How dare he? He knew Megatron and knew how 
to surive here? To him, Striker might as well be a rookie, with Sinesis. The 
greedy fool. As far as he was concerned, he was leader.

He looked up at him, with his crimson eyes burning brightly. "You? No 
way,tin-horn! Ah'm in charge! And if Megatron is alive, let me hear it from 
'im! Ya don't know nothin'! Ah's been here longa than ya. Ah's seen weirder 
slag than ya, so ah'm in charge. Who ya think ya are? Ah'm one of Megatron's 
original troops! Ah knew that Rattrap wasn't nothin' but trouble. Ah's say, 
ah'm in charge!" He ducked his head at the pain at his leg.

Suddenly, Quickstrike nearly had a spark attack, hearing a foreign voice, 
Hiss'. He jerked his head towards him, with his eyes wild. "Who's friend?" 
he asked Hiss. Transulas, he was thinking. Oh, Primus, he hooped so. His 
venom blaster iched to shoot this bot.
